Bibliographic References: PP, no. 58; PPSupp, no. 72, pi. 9 d; Beaxley, loc. cit., fig. 6.
Imagery Description: (a) Dionysos, holding 'skewer of fruit' in r. hand, with drapery over 1. arm, bending forward beside young PanNon Sepcifiedsatyr, holding wreath and thyrsus, (b) Air, with 'skewer of fruit' + A2r, with stick.
